fields_of_interest: Humanitarian aid and civil protection, Culture and media, Trade, Consumers, Culture, Energy, Business and Industry, Environment, Youth, Justice and Fundamental Rights, Public Health, Food Safety, Digital economy and society, Sport, Transport, Climate Action
eu_initiatives: We are often retained to implement events in support of specific topics and policy areas - the most recent being around the following policy areas. Smoking cessation, understanding Lung Health in Europe, Tuberculosis in Europe, World Sight Day exhibition and dinner debate, Cervical Cancer MEP/Stakeholder Summit and Disruptive Innovation in Healthcare.
relevant_communication: As a dedicated provider of EU events, we are generally retained to provide events supported by the development of event materials, approved, in-advance by hosting MEPs  for communicating at our events on the day. These events can take the form of debates or exhibitions - depending on the topic and suitability of format.
goals__remit: To support dialogue between EU policy-makers, policy-formers and the wider stakeholder community, through the  organising of seminars, conferences, debates, meetings and exhibitions on various topics/issues, mainly in the healthcare, health provision and pharmaceutical sectors. As a business we have been working with various sponsoring MEPs across all political groups since 2005 - both in the European Parliament and externally. We are an independent event business dedicated to dialogue with the EU affairs community.
